name: Wall of Thorns
description: You create a wall of tough, pliable, tangled brush bristling with thorns. The wall can be up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick, or a circle with a 20-foot diameter, 20 feet high, and 5 feet thick. Each creature in the wallâ€™s area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 7d8 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
